plot: As 'Pilot One', the player is guided by Captain Power and Jennifer 'Pilot' Chase in a mission to destroy a massive Bio-Dread military industrial complex, where Lord Dread manufactures his Bio-Dread troopers.
title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Bio-Dread Strike Mission
plot_es: As 'Pilot One', the player is guided by Captain Power and Jennifer 'Pilot' Chase in a mission to destroy a massive Bio-Dread military industrial complex, where Lord Dread manufactures his Bio-Dread troopers.
original_name: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Bio-Dread Strike Mission
plot_en: As 'Pilot One', the player is guided by Captain Power and Jennifer 'Pilot' Chase in a mission to destroy a massive Bio-Dread military industrial complex, where Lord Dread manufactures his Bio-Dread troopers.
